snippet: In a speech to a friendly audience of students in Mexico City, President Obama said it was time to embrace a new image of the country as an emerging power.
abstract: Pres Obama, speaking to a friendly audience of students in Mexico City, declares a new era in relations with Mexico, saying it is time to embrace country's new image as emerging power.

byline.original: By RANDAL C. ARCHIBOLD and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
byline.contributor: Randal C. Archibold reported from Mexico City, and Michael D. Shear from San José, Costa Rica. Damien Cave and Elisabeth Malkin contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: In a speech to a friendly audience of students in Mexico City, President Obama said it was time to embrace a new image of the country as an emerging power.

headline.seo: Obama Seeks to Banish Stereotypical Image of Mexico
headline.main: Obama Tells Mexico Audience of New Era in Relations
headline.print_headline: Obama Tells Mexico Audience of New Era in Relations
